plot.description: Plot object to annotate with y-axis

at.description: A numeric vector of y-value locations for tick marks

label.description: A logical value indicating whether to draw the labelson the tick marks, or an expression or character vector which specifythe labels to use

main.description: A logical value indicating whether to draw the y-axis atthe left of the plot

scipen.description: An integer indicating the penalty to be applied whendeciding to print numeric values in fixed or exponential notation

axisLine.description: A logical value indicating whether to show the axis line

params.description: An optional \link[plotgardener]{pgParams} objectcontaining relevant function parameters
